verses.verse: Now Pashur <WH6583> the son <WH1121> of Immer <WH564> the priest, <WH3548> who <WH1931> was also chief <WH5057> governor <WH6496> in the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> heard <WH8085> that <WH853> Jeremiah <WH3414> prophesied <WH5012> <WH853> these <WH428> things. <WH1697>

Then Pashur <WH6583> smote <WH5221> <WH853> Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet, <WH5030> and put <WH5414> him in <WH5921> the stocks <WH4115> that <WH834> were in the high <WH5945> gate <WH8179> of Benjamin, <WH1144> which <WH834> was by the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And it came to pass <WH1961> on the morrow, <WH4480> <WH4283> that Pashur <WH6583> brought forth <WH3318> <WH853> Jeremiah <WH3414> out of <WH4480> the stocks. <WH4115> Then said <WH559> Jeremiah <WH3414> unto <WH413> him, The LORD <WH3068> hath not <WH3808> called <WH7121> thy name <WH8034> Pashur, <WH6583> but <WH3588> <WH518> Magor-missabib. <WH4036>

For <WH3588> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> Behold, <WH2009> I will make <WH5414> thee a terror <WH4032> to thyself, and to all <WH3605> thy friends: <WH157> and they shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719> of their enemies, <WH341> and thine eyes <WH5869> shall behold <WH7200> it: and I will give <WH5414> all <WH3605> Judah <WH3063> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> and he shall carry them captive <WH1540> into Babylon, <WH894> and shall slay <WH5221> them with the sword. <WH2719>

Moreover I will deliver <WH5414> <WH853> all <WH3605> the strength <WH2633> of this <WH2063> city, <WH5892> and all <WH3605> the labors <WH3018> thereof, and all <WH3605> the precious things <WH3366> thereof, and all <WH3605> the treasures <WH214> of the kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> will I give <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies, <WH341> which shall spoil <WH962> them, and take <WH3947> them, and carry <WH935> them to Babylon. <WH894>

And thou, <WH859> Pashur, <WH6583> and all <WH3605> that dwell <WH3427> in thine house <WH1004> shall go <WH1980> into captivity: <WH7628> and thou shalt come <WH935> to Babylon, <WH894> and there <WH8033> thou shalt die, <WH4191> and shalt be buried <WH6912> there, <WH8033> thou, <WH859> and all <WH3605> thy friends, <WH157> to whom <WH834> thou hast prophesied <WH5012> lies. <WH8267>

O LORD, <WH3068> thou hast deceived <WH6601> me, and I was deceived: <WH6601> thou art stronger <WH2388> than I, and hast prevailed: <WH3201> I am <WH1961> in derision <WH7814> daily, <WH3605> <WH3117> every one <WH3605> mocketh <WH3932> me.

For <WH3588> since <WH4480> <WH1767> I spoke, <WH1696> I cried out, <WH2199> I cried <WH7121> violence <WH2555> and spoil; <WH7701> because <WH3588> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> was made <WH1961> a reproach <WH2781> unto me, and a derision, <WH7047> daily. <WH3605> <WH3117>

Then I said, <WH559> I will not <WH3808> make mention <WH2142> of him, nor <WH3808> speak <WH1696> any more <WH5750> in his name. <WH8034> But his word was <WH1961> in mine heart <WH3820> as a burning <WH1197> fire <WH784> shut up <WH6113> in my bones, <WH6106> and I was weary <WH3811> with forbearing, <WH3557> and I could <WH3201> not <WH3808> stay.

For <WH3588> I heard <WH8085> the defaming <WH1681> of many, <WH7227> fear <WH4032> on every side. <WH4480> <WH5439> Report, <WH5046> say they, and we will report <WH5046> it. All <WH3605> my familiars <WH582> <WH7965> watched <WH8104> for my halting, <WH6761> saying, Peradventure <WH194> he will be enticed, <WH6601> and we shall prevail <WH3201> against him, and we shall take <WH3947> our revenge <WH5360> on <WH4480> him.

But the LORD <WH3068> is with <WH854> me as a mighty <WH1368> terrible one: <WH6184> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> my persecutors <WH7291> shall stumble, <WH3782> and they shall not <WH3808> prevail: <WH3201> they shall be greatly <WH3966> ashamed; <WH954> for <WH3588> they shall not <WH3808> prosper: <WH7919> their everlasting <WH5769> confusion <WH3639> shall never <WH3808> be forgotten. <WH7911>

But, O LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> that triest <WH974> the righteous, <WH6662> and seest <WH7200> the reins <WH3629> and the heart, <WH3820> let me see <WH7200> thy vengeance <WH5360> on <WH4480> them: for <WH3588> unto <WH413> thee have I opened <WH1540> <WH853> my cause. <WH7379>

Sing <WH7891> unto the LORD, <WH3068> praise <WH1984> ye <WH853> the LORD: <WH3068> for <WH3588> he hath delivered <WH5337> <WH853> the soul <WH5315> of the poor <WH34> from the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of evildoers. <WH7489>
Cursed <WH779> be the day <WH3117> wherein <WH834> I was born: <WH3205> let not <WH408> the day <WH3117> wherein <WH834> my mother <WH517> bore <WH3205> me be <WH1961> blessed. <WH1288>

Cursed <WH779> be the man <WH376> who <WH834> brought tidings <WH1319> to <WH853> my father, <WH1> saying, <WH559> A man <WH2145> child <WH1121> is born <WH3205> unto thee; making him very glad. <WH8055> <WH8055>

And let that <WH1931> man <WH376> be <WH1961> as the cities <WH5892> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> overthrew, <WH2015> and repented <WH5162> not: <WH3808> and let him hear <WH8085> the cry <WH2201> in the morning, <WH1242> and the shouting <WH8643> at noontide; <WH6256> <WH6672>

Because <WH834> he slew <WH4191> me not <WH3808> from the womb; <WH4480> <WH7358> or that my mother <WH517> might have been <WH1961> my grave, <WH6913> and her womb <WH7358> to be always <WH5769> great <WH2030> with me.
Wherefore <WH4100> came I forth <WH3318> out of the womb <WH4480> <WH7358> to see <WH7200> labor <WH5999> and sorrow, <WH3015> that my days <WH3117> should be consumed <WH3615> with shame? <WH1322>
